metadata.title: CVE-2018-10857 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: git-annex is vulnerable to a private data exposure and exfiltration attack. It could expose the content of files located outside the git-annex repository, or content from a private web server on localhost or the LAN.

criterions.comment: git-annex package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.20190129-3').
